name: TowerBuilder
description:
TowerBuilder is a game for Mini Jam 113

Info:

In TowerBuilder you can buy and upgrade Buidings and you have to defend the monolyth from the enemies.

Controls:

  • PLACE / UPGRADE = Left Mouse Button
  • BUILD MODE ENTER = E
  • BUILD MODE LEAVE = ESC / Right Mouse Button
  • DESTROY = Right Mouse Button
